entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 9.
